reviewText: Simply the best Match 3 game on Steam with many original ideas and features. Well done devs.

reviewText: Surprisingly cute and polished match-3 game with a colorful tileset, interesting board designs and a whole slew of abilites you slowly unlock. You're definitely not going to see anything that totally turns match-3 on its head, but if you're looking for an inexpensive chill match-3 game this one stands out as really well done with a really campy style.
voteText: 2 of 3 people (67%) found this review helpful

reviewText: This is way too addictive to be just $5. The visuals are bright and colourful and animate very fluidly across the board. If you\'re into match three games then you kind of have to get this one.
